title: Enhancing catechins, antioxidant and sirtuin 1 enzyme stimulation activities in green tea extract through pulse electric field-assisted water extraction: Optimization by response surface methodology approach
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Nuttinee Salee, Srisuwan Naruenartwongsakul, Wantida Chaiyana, Artit Yawootti, Kanyarat Suthapakti, Piyawan Simapaisarn, Worrapob Chaisan, Niramon Utama-ang
